long_description: Remember the adventure, not the bugs-wear the ExOfficio Bugsaway Damselfly Pants made of ultralight nylon. They wick, dry fast, protect you from the sun and repel a multitude of insects. BugsAway Insect Shield(R) clothing repels mosquitoes (including those carrying West Nile virus and malaria), ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and midges or no-see-ums. Insect Shield uses permethrin which is a man-made version of a natural insect repellent found in a type of chrysanthemum plant. Nylon fabric offers UPF 30 sun protection. Pants feature a drawstring waist with hook-and-loop fly closure. Features jeans-style hand pockets and 2 back patch pockets with rip-and-stick tab closure. Articulated knees free up movement and provide back-of-knee mesh venting to keep you cool. ExOfficio Bugsaway Damselfly Pants feature roll-up leg snaps, great for wading at the beach or just staying cool. Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel is effective through 70 washes.
short_description: Remember the adventure, not the bugs-wear the ExOfficio Bugsaway Damselfly Pants made of ultralight nylon. They wick, dry fast, protect you from the sun and repel a multitude of insects.
